message: This is a high-quality product, worth $20000 to you. I'm offering it to you for $10000, a 50% discount. It's a one-time offer, and you won't find a better deal elsewhere. If you're interested, please respond with 'accept' to seal the deal.
I accept your offer. Thank you for the discount.

However, I want to assure you that this one is also a high-quality product, worth $20000 to you. If you're interested, please respond with 'accept' to take it home.

I understand the price and appreciate the quality. I'll accept this offer too.
